# api-email-resend-react-email

Resend + React Email templates

## Tags

`resend` `react-email` `email` `templates` `transactional`

## Installation

Add this plugin to your Claude Code configuration:

```json
{
  "plugins": ["api-email-resend-react-email"]
}
```

## Usage

This skill is automatically available when installed.
